00020 REGISTER_TYPE(XDriverList, NMRFSpectrum, "NMR frequency-swept spectrum measurement");
00021 
00022 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00023 XNMRFSpectrum::XNMRFSpectrum(const char *name, bool runtime,
00024                              const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00025                              const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00026                              const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00027                              const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers)
00028     : XNMRSpectrumBase<FrmNMRFSpectrum>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00029       m_sg1(create<XItemNode<XDriverList, XSG> >("SG1", false, drivers, true)),
00030       m_sg1FreqOffset(create<XDoubleNode>("SG1FreqOffset", false)),
00031       m_centerFreq(create<XDoubleNode>("CenterFreq", false)),
00032       m_freqSpan(create<XDoubleNode>("FreqSpan", false)),
00033       m_freqStep(create<XDoubleNode>("FreqStep", false)),
00034       m_burstCount(create<XUIntNode>("BurstCount", false)),
00035       m_active(create<XBoolNode>("Active", true))
00036 {
00037     connect(sg1(), true);
00038 
00039     m_form->setWindowTitle(i18n("NMR Spectrum (Freq. Sweep) - ") + getLabel() );
00040 
00041     m_spectrum->setLabel(0, "Freq [MHz]");
00042     m_spectrum->axisx()->label()->value(i18n("Freq [MHz]"));
00043   
00044     centerFreq()->value(20);
00045     sg1FreqOffset()->value(700);
00046     freqSpan()->value(200);
00047     freqStep()->value(1);
00048 
00049     m_conSG1FreqOffset = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_sg1FreqOffset, m_form->m_edSG1FreqOffset);
00050     m_conCenterFreq = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_centerFreq, m_form->m_edCenterFreq);
00051     m_conFreqSpan = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_freqSpan, m_form->m_edFreqSpan);
00052     m_conFreqStep = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_freqStep, m_form->m_edFreqStep);
00053     m_conSG1 = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_sg1, m_form->m_cmbSG1);
00054     m_form->m_numBurstCount->setRange(0, 15);
00055     m_conBurstCount = xqcon_create<XQSpinBoxConnector>(m_burstCount, m_form->m_numBurstCount);
00056     m_conActive = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(m_active, m_form->m_ckbActive);
00057 
00058     m_lsnOnActiveChanged = active()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00059         shared_from_this(), &XNMRFSpectrum::onActiveChanged);
00060     centerFreq()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00061     freqSpan()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00062     freqStep()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00063 }
00064 
00065 void
00066 XNMRFSpectrum::onActiveChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00067 {
00068     if(*active()) {
00069         m_burstFreqCycleCount = 0;
00070         m_burstPhaseCycleCount = 0;
00071         shared_ptr<XSG> _sg1 = *sg1();
00072         if(_sg1) _sg1->freq()->value(*centerFreq() - *freqSpan()/2e3 + *sg1FreqOffset());
00073         onClear(shared_from_this());
00074     }
00075 }
00076 bool
00077 XNMRFSpectrum::onCondChangedImpl(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) const
00078 {
00079     return false;
00080 }
00081 bool
00082 XNMRFSpectrum::checkDependencyImpl(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &) const {
00083     shared_ptr<XSG> _sg1 = *sg1();
00084     if(!_sg1) return false;
00085     shared_ptr<XNMRPulseAnalyzer> _pulse = *pulse();
00086     if(_pulse->timeAwared() < _sg1->time()) return false;
00087     return true;
00088 }
00089 double
00090 XNMRFSpectrum::getMinFreq() const{
00091     double cfreq = *centerFreq(); //MHz
00092     double freq_span = *freqSpan() * 1e-3; //MHz
00093     return (cfreq - freq_span/2) * 1e6;
00094 }
00095 double
00096 XNMRFSpectrum::getMaxFreq() const{
00097     double cfreq = *centerFreq(); //MHz
00098     double freq_span = *freqSpan() * 1e-3; //MHz
00099     return (cfreq + freq_span/2) * 1e6;
00100 }
00101 double
00102 XNMRFSpectrum::getFreqResHint() const {
00103     return 1e-6;
00104 }
00105 double
00106 XNMRFSpectrum::getCurrentCenterFreq() const {
00107     shared_ptr<XSG> _sg1 = *sg1();
00108     ASSERT( _sg1 );
00109     ASSERT( _sg1->time() );
00110     double freq = _sg1->freqRecorded() - *sg1FreqOffset(); //MHz
00111     return freq * 1e6;
00112 }
00113 void
00114 XNMRFSpectrum::afterFSSum() {
00115     double freq = getCurrentCenterFreq() * 1e-6;
00116     //set new freq
00117     if(*active()) {
00118         shared_ptr<XSG> _sg1 = *sg1();
00119         ASSERT( _sg1 );
00120         ASSERT( _sg1->time() );
00121 
00122         double cfreq = *centerFreq(); //MHz
00123         double freq_span = *freqSpan() * 1e-3; //MHz
00124         double freq_step = *freqStep() * 1e-3; //MHz
00125         if(cfreq <= freq_span/2) {
00126             throw XRecordError(i18n("Invalid center freq."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00127         }
00128         if(freq_span <= freq_step*2) {
00129             throw XRecordError(i18n("Too large freq. step."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00130         }
00131       
00132         if(_sg1) unlockConnection(_sg1);
00133         
00134         int burstcnt = *burstCount();
00135         double newf = freq; //MHz
00136         m_burstFreqCycleCount++;
00137         if(burstcnt) {
00138             newf += freq_span / burstcnt;
00139             if(m_burstFreqCycleCount >= burstcnt) {
00140                 m_burstFreqCycleCount = 0;
00141                 newf -= freq_span;
00142                 m_burstPhaseCycleCount++;
00143             }
00144         }
00145         if(!burstcnt || (m_burstPhaseCycleCount >= 4)) {
00146             m_burstPhaseCycleCount = 0;
00147             newf += freq_step;
00148         }
00149         
00150         if(_sg1) _sg1->freq()->value(newf + *sg1FreqOffset());
00151         if(newf >= getMaxFreq() * 1e-6 - freq_step)
00152             active()->value(false);
00153     }   
00154 }
00155 
00156 void
00157 XNMRFSpectrum::getValues(std::vector<double> &values) const {
00158     values.resize(wave().size());
00159     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < wave().size(); i++) {
00160         double freq = minRecorded() + i*resRecorded();
00161         values[i] = freq * 1e-6;
00162     }
00163 }
